snippet: A 30-day prison sentence for a teacher who raped a 14-year-old student drew widespread criticism.
abstract: Montana attorney general’s office asks State Supreme Court to throw out a 30-day sentence given to Stacey Rambold, teacher convicted of raping a 14-year-old girl in 2007, saying the punishment was illegally lenient.
lead_paragraph: A 30-day prison sentence for a teacher who raped a 14-year-old student drew widespread criticism.

headline.main: Montana Appeals Sentence in Rape of 14-Year-Old Girl
headline.print_headline: State Appeals Sentence In Rape of 14-Year-Old Girl
